title: Hour 2 - Super Bowl Favorites, Dean Blandino
itunes:title: Hour 2 - Super Bowl Favorites, Dean Blandino
description:
Dan and the Danettes discuss the upcoming NFL season, and which team is likely to hoist the Lombardi Trophy. Plus, former NFL Head of Officials, Dean Blandino explains where the points of emphasis will be for this season's officiating.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
